name: exculpatory
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
involving the removal of blame from someone: Exculpatory evidence was ignored. He dismissed the exculpatory remarks concerning the woman’s innocence. See
exculpate
More examplesFewer examplesThe prosecution had failed to give defence lawyers exculpatory evidence.The defence then must find anything exculpatory.The witness is expected to provide exculpatory testimony.
